text:
*Hi all,* 

*I was hoping someone could help me with this query, I’m trying to figure out how my entries I have in hubDB which belong to each category.*

*I can do it with this query:*
*{% set entry_count = hubdb_table_rows(table_id,“&cateogory__contains=“~category_id)|length %}*

*But that is limited to ten uses, I have more than ten categories.*
*Any idea?*
I think you could pull down all the rows then loop through all of them and within each iteration, loop through the categories storing and updating the count on a dictionary
